name: Arsonist Café
description:
(Pause menu with volume and sensitivity control available by pressing Escape or P)

Move with WASD, look with mouse, and click to interact. Fulfill orders as robots come in to prevent them from lighting fire to the café, and raising the temperature. If the bar reaches full, you lose.

A game made for VimJam 3 in 10 days, with the focus Multi-Use, and the theme Turn up the Heat.

Used Assets

Textures

https://beefpuppy.itch.io/hptt

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/water/foam-textures-72313
